item.title: We're participating in Prendete
item.description: To further boost retinar and benefit the implementation of our solution, we’re thrilled to announce that we’re participating from the 2020 edition of Prendete, the contest of innovative business ideas.

item.title: Our website is online!
item.description: We’re very excited to announce the launch of our website! This is yet another tool to keep you updated about our latest news.

item.title: José Ignacio Orlando
item.description: José Ignacio Orlando (Nacho) received his Software Engineering degree in 2013 at Universidad Nacional del Centro de la Provincia de Buenos Aires (UNICEN) in Tandil, Argentina.
